remarks: The multiples of an element with infinite order form an infinite cyclic subgroup of ` G ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jan-2015.)
statement:
odf1.1 $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
odf1.2 $e |- O = ( od ` G ) $.
odf1.3 $e |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) $.
odf1.4 $e |- F = ( x e. ZZ |-> ( x .x. A ) ) $.
odinf $p |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X /\ ( O ` A ) = 0 ) -> -. ran F e. Fin ) $.
$d .x. x $.
$d A x $.
$d G x $.
$d O x $.
$d X x $.
